name: WordCountGuardrail
description: Validates the request or response content to ensure it complies with the specified minimum and maximum sentence count limits.

policyAttributes.name: name
policyAttributes.description: The name of the guardrail policy. This will be used for tracking purposes.

policyAttributes.name: min
policyAttributes.description: The minimum number of words the content must contain.

policyAttributes.name: max
policyAttributes.description: The maximum number of words the content must contain.

policyAttributes.name: jsonPath
policyAttributes.description: The JSONPath expression used to extract content from the payload. If not specified, the entire payload will be used for validation.

policyAttributes.name: invert
policyAttributes.description: If enabled, inverts the guardrail blocking decision, causing the guardrail to intervene and return an error response when a match is found in the content.

policyAttributes.name: showAssessment
policyAttributes.description: When enabled, the error response will include detailed information about the reason for the guardrail intervention.
